text: #DEAHQ, you are on the wrong side of history. The preclinical data is clear, Endocannabinoid system is a novel target for #cancer. I shrank my terminal ovarian cancer on #Cannabis. Why are blocking research I need to stay alive?  @NCIAorg   #JustSayNoToDEA https://t.co/Xp0AdmRQBV https://t.co/Xe8xwaCJaS
